edu.cccnj.FivePoints.Components

Class Lane

  • java.lang.Object
    • edu.cccnj.FivePoints.Components.Lane
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Actor

    public class Lane
extends java.lang.Object
implements Actor
    Lanes are the containers for most of the actual actors themselves. It contains a queue of cars which are controlled by a TrafficLight, and optionally constrained by a maxCount.

    • Constructor Summary

      Create a new lane with a give TrafficLight
